AQI Monitor

 AQI Monitor subscribes to a web socket using okHttp library and provides real time updates about air quality index(AQI) for selected cities.

 The app stores the fetched data in a local db and allows you to view available historical data when offline.

 When online you can view realtime data for any city you select.
